titlestmt.titleproper: Paisley, Oldham Scrapbooks on Microfilm 5181 mf

change.item: This resource was modified by the ArchivesSpace Preprocessor developed by the Harvard Library (https://github.com/harvard-library/archivesspace-preprocessor)

repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: This is a collection of scrap books with news clippings and pamphlets about gangster activities. Pamphlets included : The Herrin Massacre by Chatland Parker (1923) ; The Bark of the Automatics, editorials by Fred J. Kern ; KKK Experiment in Journalism ; The Life Story of Charlie Birger : History of the Crimes of The Birger Gang

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This is a collection of scrap books with news clippings and pamphlets about gangster activities. Pamphlets included : The Herrin Massacre by Chatland Parker (1923) ; The Bark of the Automatics, editorials by Fred J. Kern ; KKK Experiment in Journalism ; The Life Story of Charlie Birger : History of the Crimes of The Birger Gang

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Oldham Paisley Scrapbooks on Microfilm #5181 mf. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Oldham Paisley. Scrapbooks -- vol. 8-9 and Misc. Pamphlets
